NOTE: Vimeo and LOOM are different

TODO: npm install --save @u-wave/react-vimeo
TODO: npm install react-loom


import ReactLoom from "react-loom";
import Vimeo from "react-vimeo";

function App() {
  // assume video is a string variable that holds the video link generated by AI tool
  return (
    <div className="App">
      <ReactLoom
        url={video} // pass the video link as a prop
        width="100%"
        height="500px"
        autoplay
        controls
      />
      <Vimeo
        url={video} // pass the video link as a prop
        width="100%"
        height="500px"
        autoplay
        showByline
        showPortrait
        showTitle
      />
    </div>
  );
}
